metadata.name: We Were Meant For Each Other
metadata.description:
'Just two Lost souls swimming in a fishbowl'

This is the First #NFT minted from the "Surrealistic Pillow" Project by Ronen Goldman

The "Surrealistic pillow" project is 14 years in the making, has been exhibited in fine-art print form - worldwide.

The series depicts various dream and day-dream induced scenes, The story unfolds in a single frame, a visual poem.
